titles.title: Menstrual Products for Employees Act
Menstrual Products for Employees Act
To amend the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970 to require employers to provide menstrual hygiene products for employees.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Workforce Protections.

bill.summary:
Menstrual Products for Employees Act
This bill amends the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970 by requiring the Department of Labor to issue a rule that requires each private employer with at least 100 employees to provide free menstrual hygiene products for their employees.
